Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
App anxiety is real, but it doesnâ€™t have to derail your modernization projects. Between Windows 11 upgrades, SCCM-to-Intune migrations, and the move to AVD/Windows 365, IT teams are under pressure to move fast without breaking things. Manual testing, app conflicts, and downtime make that impossible. This live demo shows how Rimo3 automation flips the script validating apps, accelerating migrations, and keeping your environment stable, evergreen, and future-ready.
